com.metaio.junaio.plugin.view
Class JunaioARViewActivity

java.lang.Object
  android.content.Context
      android.content.ContextWrapper
          android.view.ContextThemeWrapper
              android.app.Activity
                  com.google.android.maps.MapActivity
                      com.metaio.junaio.plugin.view.JunaioViewActivity
                          com.metaio.junaio.plugin.view.JunaioARViewActivity
All Implemented Interfaces:
android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.content.ComponentCallbacks2, android.media.MediaPlayer.OnCompletionListener, android.media.MediaPlayer.OnErrorListener, android.media.MediaPlayer.OnInfoListener, android.media.MediaPlayer.OnPreparedListener, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback, android.view.LayoutInflater.Factory, android.view.LayoutInflater.Factory2, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener, android.view.Window.Callback, JunaioDataManager.Callback, com.metaio.sdk.MetaioSurfaceView.Callback, com.metaio.sdk.SensorsComponentAndroid.Callback
public class JunaioARViewActivity
extends JunaioViewActivity
implements com.metaio.sdk.MetaioSurfaceView.Callback, android.media.MediaPlayer.OnCompletionListener, android.media.MediaPlayer.OnPreparedListener, android.media.MediaPlayer.OnErrorListener, android.media.MediaPlayer.OnInfoListener

This is Junaio AR view activity. It may be executed with default behavior, however for customized behavior and GUI, this should be extended and relevant methods should be overridden.

onSurfaceCreated

public void onSurfaceCreated()
Description copied from interface: com.metaio.sdk.MetaioSurfaceView.Callback
This is called when OpenGL surface has been created. The metaioSDK can be initialized in this callback, e.g. setting clipping plane limits etc. Also, audio renderer should be registered in this callback.

Specified by:

Show progress.

This method is called whenever a background process is started or stopped. Note that is may be called from non GUI thread, so any GUI handling should be done in GUI thread, i.e. Activity.runOnUiThread

Specified by:
showProgressBar in class JunaioViewActivity
Parameters:
progress - float between 0.0 and 1.0, determines the progress of the bunch of pois
show - true to show, or false to hide progress

setChannel

protected void setChannel(int channelID)
Description copied from class: JunaioViewActivity
Set channel to be viewed. This will first download channel detail information and then on success it will search POIs. The existing POIs will be removed before performing search.

Overrides:
setChannel in class JunaioViewActivity
Parameters:
channelID - Channel ID to view

showVisualSearchResults

protected void showVisualSearchResults()
This method is called to show visual search results requested by calling performChannelVisualSearch().

Note that it is called before the actual request is made, so that application can switch to another Activity, and the activity must register callback to junaioDataManager to receive the results.

onCodeDetected

protected void onCodeDetected(java.lang.String codeType,
                              java.lang.String codeValue)
Called when barcode or QR code is detected. The application should override to handle the code

Parameters:
codeType - Code type
codeValue - Code value

trackAPIUsage

protected void trackAPIUsage(int statusCode,
                             java.lang.String apiCall,
                             java.lang.String extraInfo,
                             float requestDuration)
String used to log to your analytics tracking systems if you want. This is just a stub. There is no need to call the superclass.

Parameters:
statusCode - status code of the request logged
